Screen.title: TopScreen
Screen.Label: ---------- Mouse Button 1 click on field to change ----------

Help.Tip: Menu allowing user choice of stored parameter defaults.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PROCESSDEFAULTS
Menu allowing user choice of stored parameter defaults.
 
 Default = SYSTEM
 Allowed = SYSTEM
 Allowed = PROJECT
 Allowed = USER
 SYSTEM defaults are the defaults listed in the CPS documentation.
 
 PROJECT defaults are defaults the user has saved via the Save as Project
 Default button.
 
 USER defaults are defaults the user has saved via the Save as User Default
 button.

Help.Tip: Press button to read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - READ_LIST
Press button to read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 
 When the READ_LIST button is pressed the
 FXSTACK  will read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.

Help.Tip: Press button to write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - WRITE_LIST
Press button to write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 
 When the WRITE_LIST button is pressed the
 FXSTACK  will write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 This will only happen if OPT_TRIN=INFO_TRIN.

Help.Tip: Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN or PATH_TRIN.
Help.Text:
fxstack - OPT_TRIN
Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN or PATH_TRIN.
 
 Default = LIST_TRIN
 Allowed = LIST_TRIN Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN.
 Allowed = INFO_TRIN Set trace sum files from INFO_TRIN.

Help.Tip: Initialize the trot file to zero.
Help.Text:
fxstack - INITIALIZE_TROT
Initialize the trot file to zero.
 
 Default = YES
 Allowed = YES
 Allowed = NO

Help.Tip: File lock time in seconds.
Help.Text:
fxstack - TIME_LOCK
File lock time in seconds.
 
 Default = 60
 Allowed = 1 <= int

Help.Tip: Number of trace in input buffer.
Help.Text:
fxstack - NUM_TRIN
Number of trace in input buffer.
 
 Default = 100
 Allowed = 1 <= int
 FXSTACK will work on groups of NUM_TRIN traces at each pass.
 Making this bigger should reduce disk thrashing.

Help.Tip: Select the output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxstack - SELECT_INFO_TROT
Select the output trace file name.

Help.Tip: Output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxstack - INFO_TROT
Output trace file name.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Select the output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxstack - SELECT_PATH_TROT
Select the output trace file name.

Help.Tip: Output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PATH_TROT
Output trace file name.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Select the list file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - SELECT_LIST_TRIN
Select the list file name of sum trace files.
 
 The following is an example of a LIST_TRIN file which contains the names
 of two files.
 INFO_TRIN = (
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01a.trc ,
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01b.trc
 )

Help.Tip: List file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - LIST_TRIN
List file name of sum trace files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character
 The following is an example of a LIST_TRIN file which contains the names
 of two files.
 INFO_TRIN = (
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01a.trc ,
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01b.trc
 )

Help.Tip: List file name of sum info files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - INFO_TRIN
List file name of sum info files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: List file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PATH_TRIN
List file name of sum trace files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Button that removes this process parameter screen.
Help.Text:
fxstack - CLOSE
Button that removes this process parameter screen.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Appears only on the view-only process parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button to accept parameter values, run traps and remove screen.
Help.Text:
fxstack - OK
Button to accept parameter values, run traps and remove screen.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts parameter values, runs the parameter traps and removes
 the parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps.
Help.Text:
fxstack - APPLY
Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps but does
 not remove the parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button to remove the parameter screen without changing parameters.
Help.Text:
fxstack - CANCEL
Button to remove the parameter screen without changing parameters.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =

Help.Tip: Set parameters to their initial value or last applied value.
Help.Text:
fxstack - RESET
Set parameters to their initial value or last applied value.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that sets the parameters back to their values when the screen appeared
 or to their last applied value.

Help.Tip: Accept the current parameters and move to the previous process.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PROCESSLISTLEFT
Accept the current parameters and move to the previous process.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to the previous process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Menu of processes in the current workfile and their number.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PROCESSLIST
Menu of processes in the current workfile and their number.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Menu that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to any chosen process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Accept the current parameters and move to the next process.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PROCESSLISTRIGHT
Accept the current parameters and move to the next process.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to the next process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Save the current parameter values as Project Defaults.
Help.Text:
fxstack - PROJECTDEFAULT
Save the current parameter values as Project Defaults.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that saves the current parameter values as Project Defaults for this
 process.  There will be one set of Project Defaults for a project.

Help.Tip: Save the current parameter values as User Defaults.
Help.Text:
fxstack - USERDEFAULT
Save the current parameter values as User Defaults.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that saves the current parameter values as User Defaults for this
 process.  There will be one set of User Defaults for a userid.

Help.Tip: Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
Help.Text:
fxstack - HELP
Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 The Help Window allows access to three kinds of help:  Parameter Help, CPS
 Process Help and Application (CFE) Help.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         C P S   P R O C E S S
 
 Name       : fxstack    ( FX STACK )
 Category   : Stacks
 Written    : 2002-04-03   by: Douglas Hanson
 Revised    : 2006-04-25   by: Ioan Vlad  Remove unused variables.
 Maturity   : production
 Purpose    : Stack fxshot images
 Portability: No known limitations.
 Parallel   : No
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          GENERAL DESCRIPTION
 
 Stack partial images for FX shot profile migration.
 
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          ADVICE FOR USERS
 
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             REVISION HISTORY
     Date        Author        Description
     ----        ------        -----------
 20  2006-04-25 Ioan Vlad      Remove unused variables.
 19  2005-05-24 Douglas Hanson Check LIST_TRIN.
 18  2005-01-31 R.S.Day        Promoted to beta.
 17  2004-08-19 Douglas Hanson Use headsave structure.
 16  2004-08-12 Douglas Hanson Use fxdata_get_info_type
 15  2004-04-22 R.S.Day        Set info_type on output
 14  2004-03-26 Douglas Hanson Add path_trot to info file.
 13  2004-03-25 Douglas Hanson Fix gui.
 12  2004-01-23 Douglas Hanson Use new fxpar_create.
 11  2002-10-28 Douglas Hanson Fix sensitivity.
 10  2002-09-26 Douglas Hanson Standardize pointer nulls.
  9  2002-09-25 Douglas Hanson Standardize parameter names.
  8  2002-09-23 Douglas Hanson Use new info structure.
  7  2002-06-17 Douglas Hanson Fix output headers.
  6  2002-06-14 Douglas Hanson Add status prints.
  5  2002-06-13 Douglas Hanson Add trcio extent size.
  4  2002-06-12 Douglas Hanson Add shot list logic.
  3  2002-05-14 R.S.Day        Corrected print stats.
  2  2002-05-09 Douglas Hanson Add WRITE_LIST button.
  1  2002-04-18 Douglas Hanson Original version.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
